name: Python Azure Function Hello World
initializeCommand: curl https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | gpg --dearmor > /usr/share/keyrings/microsoft.gpg && echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/microsoft.gpg] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/microsoft-debian-$(lsb_release -rs)-prod $(lsb_release -cs) main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/azure-functions.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y azure-functions-core-tools-4
postCreateCommand: poetry config virtualenvs.in-project true && poetry install
